thread.title: Sea spray looks like snow blanketing Blackpool seafront
thread.title_full: Sea spray looks like snow blanketing Blackpool seafront | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Sea spray looks like snow blanketing Blackpool seafront
text:
The vicious winds from Storm Doris have whipped up the sea at Blackpool, making the seafront look as if it's been snowing.
Blackpool seafront Credit: Victoria Grimes, ITV Granada The seafront looks as if it's had a dusting of snow Credit: Victoria Grimes, ITV Granada Read more 27 updates Storm Doris batters North West Weather
